data: BMT AMB Post Melphalan Management (Day of Treatment)
RN to activate the Instructions phase of this Plan
Provider to select the following communication orders if applicable for ongoing labwork
RN to place Lab order for CBC and Differential every visit
RN to place Lab order for INR once a week
RN to place Lab order for Electrolyte Outpatient Panel every visit
RN to place Lab order for Urea and Creatinine Panel every visit
RN to place Lab order for Magnesium Level once a week
RN to place Lab order for Calcium Level once a week
RN to place Lab order for Phosphate Level once a week
RN to place Lab order for Liver Panel once a week
RN to place Lab order for Lactate Dehydrogenase once a week
RN to place Lab order for Aspartate Aminotransferase once a week
If temp greater than 38DegC,Notify hematology associate/fellow for initiation of antibiotics
Do not administer enemas, suppositories, IM injections, ASA or non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs (NSAIDs)
